The Big Sleep

Rank: 462


Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over- he's seen murder- blackmail--and what might be love.


Director: Howard Hawks

Writer: William Faulkner, Leigh Brackett, Jules Furthman

Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, John Ridgely

Tags: Film Noir, Hard,boiled Detective, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller
